GSD.product_version: versions from v5.0 to before v5.15.68
GSD.description:
nvme-tcp: fix UAF when detecting digest errors

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.68 by commit 13c80a6c112467bab5e44d090767930555fc17a5, it was introduced in version v5.0 by commit 3f2304f8c6d6ed97849057bd16fee99e434ca796. For more details please see the references link.
